title: Summer fruit fool
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) mixed soft fruit, such as raspberries, blackberries, blueberries or currants', '55 g (2 oz) caster sugar', '150 ml (5 fl oz) whipping cream', 'grated zest of ½ orange', '150 g (5½ oz) plain low-fat bio yogurt', 'finely shredded orange zest to decorate (optional)']
